Title: The Story of "Speed" from "Cloud Nine" to Brain Gain
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Inc.The substituted amphetamines have had a checkered medical history intertwined with a sensational cultural history. Mankind's insatiable fascination with speed has led to widespread misuse sometimes with disastrous neurological and psychiatric consequences that may cause a permanent harm but their potential to enhance cognition should not be dismissed or forgotten. Further, smarter research could perhaps still lead to an expanded beneficial role for stimulant use in modern society.
